ONE PIECE FILM RED

One Piece Film Red, for which Eiichiro Oda serves as general producer, finally opens in theaters. The film tells the story of Uta, a songstress who enchants the world, and her secret that leads to her singing voice and Shanks, Red-Haired. The theme of the film is RED, and the design features the Red-Haired Pirates and the famous scene between Luffy and Shanks. The UT design with the Red-Haired Pirates, is only available here, and is a must-have for fans.

Featuring the mysterious Shanks and the Red Hair Pirates, this UNIQLO exclusive design uses artwork from the crews climactic battle first shown in the film. The pirate flag of the Red Hair Pirates appears on the front.

息Eiichiro Oda/2022 One Piece production committee

items.shortDescription: The long-awaited fourth installment of the FILM series, "ONE PIECE FILM RED". The mysterious Shanks and his crew appear in this exclusive UT design.
